column5: Just curious how many of you plan on attending this year?  This will be my first year attending, I've heard great things.  Was wondering what other things there are to do in the area as I will have my wife and two young daughters with me as well.  Thanks - Chad
There's a SkyZone in the same plaza. Depending on the age of your kids...
I will also  be going this year. If there's any custom baits in particular you want I would suggest going early.
I have attended every Odyssey right from the beginning. It's a great day! Be prepared to spend some big bucks!
